metadata.title: Bitcoin Bounces as Jerome Powell Could Push for Another Fed Rate Cut: Barclays Research
metadata.description: Bitcoin could see a much-needed rebound as Barclays Research says Fed Chair Jerome Powell may still lean towards another 25 bps cut while other Fed officials remain divided. Meanwhile, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent claims there is no recession risk for the US economy or rise in inflation. Jerome Powell May Push for Another Fed Rate
metadata.keywords: Jerome Powell, Scott Bessent, Barclays, Fed officials, Fed Rate, Bitcoin price, Bitcoin Bounces, Barclays Research, St. Louis Fed, Fed interest rate
